segments.content: This week, the runtimes are in the spotlight. Of course, we'll be talking about Bun and Static Hermes.

segments.content: I'll spare you the heated debates on Twitter this week 😅 let's stick to positive vibes.

## 💸 赞助商 {#sponsor1}

[![企业级API，支持信息流、聊天和视频！](/emails/issues/153/stream.jpg)](https://getstream.io/video/voice-calling/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22)
[**企业级API，支持信息流、聊天和视频！**](https://getstream.io/video/docs/react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22)

segments.content: Stream is the maker of enterprise-grade **APIs** and **SDKs** that help product and engineering teams solve two common problems at scale: in-app chat and social activity feeds.
segments.sourceMdx: Stream is the maker of enterprise-grade **APIs** and **SDKs** that help product and engineering teams solve two common problems at scale: in-app chat and social activity feeds.
segments.translated_content: Stream 提供企业级 **API** 和 **SDK**，帮助产品和工程团队规模化解决两个常见问题：应用内聊天和社交动态信息流。

segments.content: With Stream, developers can integrate any type of messaging or feed experience into their app in a fraction of the time it would take to build these features from scratch. Stream Chat makes it easy for developers to integrate rich, real-time messaging into their applications.
segments.sourceMdx: With Stream, developers can integrate any type of messaging or feed experience into their app in a fraction of the time it would take to build these features from scratch. Stream Chat makes it easy for developers to integrate rich, real-time messaging into their applications.
segments.translated_content: 借助 Stream，开发者能以远低于从头构建的时间，将任何类型的消息或信息流体验集成到应用中。Stream Chat 让开发者能轻松地在应用中集成丰富的实时消息功能。

segments.content:
Stream provides robust client-side SDKs for popular frameworks such as [**React**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsorship\&utm_content=\&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22), [**React-Native**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react-native/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsorship\&utm_content=\&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22), Expo, Flutter, Android, Angular, Compose, Unreal, and iOS.
Unlock enterprise-grade features, functions, and UI components completely free for your startup or side project with the Maker Account.
segments.sourceMdx:

segments.translated_content: Stream 为流行框架提供强大的客户端 SDK，包括 [**React**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22)、[**React-Native**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react-native/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22)、Expo、Flutter、Android、Angular、Compose、Unreal 和 iOS。通过 Maker 账户，初创公司或副项目可免费解锁企业级功能、函数和 UI 组件。
[**尝试新的 React 视频教程！**](https://getstream.io/video/docs/react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22)
## ⚛️ React {#react}
[![Bun 1.0](/emails/issues/159/bun.jpg)](https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v1.0)
[**Bun 1.0**](https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v1.0)

segments.content: It's impossible to miss it this week: Bun has just been released as stable v1.0. This news isn't directly related to React, but it will undoubtedly affect all React developers out there at some point.
segments.sourceMdx: It's impossible to miss it this week: Bun has just been released as stable v1.0. This news isn't directly related to React, but it will undoubtedly affect all React developers out there at some point.
segments.translated_content: 本周不可能错过它：Bun 刚刚发布了稳定的 v1.0 版本。这个消息虽然不直接与 React 相关，但无疑会在某个时候影响到所有 React 开发者。

segments.content: Bun is a complete toolchain for JavaScript and TypeScript based on Webkit and written in Zig. It is a new ultra-fast alternative to a whole host of front-end tools we use today: Node.js, npx, Babel, esbuild, swc, webpack, Jest, Vitest, npm, Yarn, pnpm... The benchmarks are super impressive and definitively real.
segments.sourceMdx: Bun is a complete toolchain for JavaScript and TypeScript based on Webkit and written in Zig. It is a new ultra-fast alternative to a whole host of front-end tools we use today: Node.js, npx, Babel, esbuild, swc, webpack, Jest, Vitest, npm, Yarn, pnpm... The benchmarks are super impressive and definitively real.
segments.translated_content: Bun 是一个基于 Webkit 并用 Zig 编写的完整 JavaScript 和 TypeScript 工具链。它是我们今天使用的众多前端工具的极速替代品：Node.js、npx、Babel、esbuild、swc、webpack、Jest、Vitest、npm、Yarn、pnpm... 基准测试结果令人印象深刻且绝对真实。

segments.content: Its compatibility with the existing tools and its mixed ESM/CJS support make it quite easy to adopt as a drop-in replacement. Bun is generally able to run your code as is, without any changes (otherwise it's [🐦 considered a bug](https://twitter.com/jarredsumner/status/1700497869160268155)). React frameworks like Next.js, Remix and Astro are already supported. Using it as a replacement for npm/Yarn/pnpm or Jest/Vitest is probably a good entry point and not too risky.
segments.sourceMdx: Its compatibility with the existing tools and its mixed ESM/CJS support make it quite easy to adopt as a drop-in replacement. Bun is generally able to run your code as is, without any changes (otherwise it's [🐦 considered a bug](https://twitter.com/jarredsumner/status/1700497869160268155)). React frameworks like Next.js, Remix and Astro are already supported. Using it as a replacement for npm/Yarn/pnpm or Jest/Vitest is probably a good entry point and not too risky.
segments.translated_content: 它与现有工具的兼容性以及对混合 ESM/CJS 的支持使其很容易作为即插即用的替代品。Bun 通常能够直接运行你的代码而无需任何修改（否则会被视为 [🐦 一个错误](https://twitter.com/jarredsumner/status/1700497869160268155)）。React 框架如 Next.js、Remix 和 Astro 已经支持它。将其作为 npm/Yarn/pnpm 或 Jest/Vitest 的替代品可能是一个不错的切入点，风险也不大。
**其他有用链接：**

## 💸 赞助商 {#sponsor2}
[![highlight.io - 开源全栈监控平台](/emails/issues/159/highlight.jpg)](http://highlight.io)
[**highlight.io - 开源全栈监控平台**](http://highlight.io)

segments.content: [**highlight.io**](http://highlight.io) is a truly open-source Session Replay, Error Monitoring, and Logging platform for your next project.
segments.sourceMdx: [**highlight.io**](http://highlight.io) is a truly open-source Session Replay, Error Monitoring, and Logging platform for your next project.
segments.translated_content: [**highlight.io**](http://highlight.io) 是真正开源的会话回放、错误监控和日志平台，适用于您的下一个项目。

segments.content: Don't waste time trying to guess why a bug occurs. Instead, use highlight and get a clear picture of whatever happens in the browser and on your server-side application.
segments.sourceMdx: Don't waste time trying to guess why a bug occurs. Instead, use highlight and get a clear picture of whatever happens in the browser and on your server-side application.
segments.translated_content: 无需浪费时间猜测错误原因。使用 highlight 即可清晰了解浏览器和服务器端应用中发生的一切。

segments.content: It is super easy to install in your favorite framework: [React.js,](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/client-sdk/reactjs) [Next.js,](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/next-js) [Remix](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/remix), or anything else!
segments.sourceMdx: It is super easy to install in your favorite framework: [React.js,](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/client-sdk/reactjs) [Next.js,](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/next-js) [Remix](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/remix), or anything else!
segments.translated_content: 在您喜爱的框架中安装非常简单：[React.js](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/client-sdk/reactjs)、[Next.js](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/next-js)、[Remix](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/remix) 或其他任何框架！
## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
[![静态版Hermes](/emails/issues/159/hermes.jpg)](https://speakerdeck.com/tmikov2023/static-hermes-react-native-eu-2023-announcement)
[**静态版Hermes**](https://speakerdeck.com/tmikov2023/static-hermes-react-native-eu-2023-announcement)

segments.content: Static Hermes was announced at React-Native EU last week. I wasn't there, so I'm trying to explain what I understood by reading the slides, as the video isn't on YouTube yet.
segments.sourceMdx: Static Hermes was announced at React-Native EU last week. I wasn't there, so I'm trying to explain what I understood by reading the slides, as the video isn't on YouTube yet.
segments.translated_content: 静态版Hermes在上周的React-Native EU大会上发布。我未亲临现场，因此通过阅读幻灯片尝试理解其原理，目前相关视频尚未上传至YouTube。

segments.content: Static Hermes is an experimental project that allows you to optionally compile some of your TypeScript (or Flow) code into native code. This offers significant performance gains (x10-20) compared to Hermes usual mode based in bytecode interpretation. It also enables easy integration with native APIs directly from your TypeScript code (zero-cost FFI, x15-80 faster than a JSI wrapper).
segments.sourceMdx: Static Hermes is an experimental project that allows you to optionally compile some of your TypeScript (or Flow) code into native code. This offers significant performance gains (x10-20) compared to Hermes usual mode based in bytecode interpretation. It also enables easy integration with native APIs directly from your TypeScript code (zero-cost FFI, x15-80 faster than a JSI wrapper).
segments.translated_content: 静态版Hermes是一个实验性项目，允许您将部分TypeScript（或Flow）代码编译为原生代码。相比基于字节码解释的常规Hermes模式，这能带来显著的性能提升（10-20倍）。同时还能直接从TypeScript代码轻松集成原生API（零成本FFI，比JSI封装快15-80倍）。

segments.content: To enable this, TypeScript must first become a "sound" language. Static Hermes will modify the semantics of JavaScript to ensure that the declared types matches the runtime types. This slide explains the concept well:
segments.sourceMdx: To enable this, TypeScript must first become a "sound" language. Static Hermes will modify the semantics of JavaScript to ensure that the declared types matches the runtime types. This slide explains the concept well:
segments.translated_content: 要实现这一点，TypeScript首先需成为"健全"语言。静态版Hermes将修改JavaScript语义，确保声明类型与运行时类型匹配。这张幻灯片很好地阐释了该概念：
[![静态版Hermes使TypeScript变得健全](/emails/issues/159/hermes2.jpg)](https://speakerdeck.com/tmikov2023/static-hermes-react-native-eu-2023-announcement?slide=14)

segments.content: A very interesting idea that could maybe one day have an impact outside the React-Native ecosystem?
segments.sourceMdx: A very interesting idea that could maybe one day have an impact outside the React-Native ecosystem?
segments.translated_content: 这个非常有趣的构想，或许有朝一日能对React-Native生态系统之外产生影响？
**其他实用链接：**

* 🐦 [Plan to support Over-The-Air updates](https://twitter.com/mdj_dev/status/1700424775116493053)
